snippet.title: Ceres Trailer
snippet.description:
If you ever wondered how it would have been to fully control and customize a small battle squadron in Homeworld, Elite, Nexus: the Jupiter Incident or hack your way into enemy ships in cyberspace,
then this game is for you !
http://store.steampowered.com/app/351300

Fast paces 3D combat with captain that level up and gain skill points and perks. Complete missions, capture hostile ships and salvage wrecked ships.
